WorkItem.Description:
It seems that Obtics requires PFX Beta for .NET 3.5.
 
I can't build the library with .NET 3.5 and PFX release or with .NET 4.0
 
Could you please upgrade it to release version of PFX?

Comments.Message: Currently working on a new release. It will be for .NET 4.0. Admittedly progress is slow.
By the way; I think only the parallel versions of obtics require PFX. The non-parallel versions do not and are still threadsafe and concurrent.
I wanted to see how obtics raytracer works :)
If that is all you want to do then you can take the latest source files. These should compile with .Net framework 4.0.
